definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The importance of scenery designing in city sewage disposal place was discoursed.
sentences.chinese: 論述景觀設計在市政污水處理場建設中的重要性。
正在尋找室外景觀設計嗎？

sentences.english: The history and culture connotations in the landscape design of the square are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了皋城廣場景觀設計中的歷史和文化內涵。

sentences.english: First, the text studies basic theory of the modern environment landscape design.
sentences.chinese: 首先，論文對現代環境景觀設計進行了基礎理論研究。

sentences.english: The most professional garden landscape design, one-stop design and construction services.
sentences.chinese: 最專業的庭院景觀設計，一站式設計施工服務。
你可以把它寫成‘景觀設計’。

sentences.english: The transformation of aesthetic standards is an important task for landscape architecture.
sentences.chinese: 美學標準的轉化是景觀設計學的一個重要任務。

sentences.english: It is widely acknowledged that low-carbon material is one of the key elements of modern green landscape design.
sentences.chinese: 低碳材料是現代綠色化景觀設計的關鍵要素之一。

sentences.english: The design of landscape is the subject having to give importance to the design of the urban elevated road.
sentences.chinese: 景觀設計是城市高架路設計中必須重視的課題。

sentences.english: Principals of sustainability are at the core of the landscape design of the Museo Del Acero Horno3.
sentences.chinese: 持久性原則是博物館景觀設計的核心。

sentences.english: History and Literature of Landscape Architecture.
sentences.chinese: 景觀設計學歷史與文獻170。

sentences.english: The text aims at studying the beauty inform of modern environment landscape design.
sentences.chinese: 本文針對現代環境景觀設計的形式美進行研究。

sentences.english: The design for flying bridge landscape is an important content in expressway project.
sentences.chinese: 跨線橋景觀設計是高速公路設計中的一個重要內容。

sentences.english: Process the transitive space in landscape designing.
sentences.chinese: 景觀設計中過渡空間的處理。

sentences.english: The article introduces the landscape design of Weining Road Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 該文介紹了威寧路橋的景觀設計。

definition: to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
a hundred flowers bloom (idiom); let the arts have free expression
to do with the masses/mass (meeting, movement etc)
